name: slizer
description:
Slizer is a top down slasher game where you fight against telekinetically controlled swords, after you insulted their mother.
Use your much larger sword to defeat them, (Space to swing)
However, your sword is so enormously large you can only swing it one way,

Use red potions to teleport to a random position and green ones to gain 3 points.

Arrow keys to move.

Space to swing.
